title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 2200.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 2200.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the policies and procedures governing
the presumptive release program for nonviolent inmates whereby eligible inmates
who satisfy all statutory, program and disciplinary criteria may be released to
parole supervision without the necessity of a personal appearance before, and a
grant of parole by, the Board of Parole. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
2200.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
